worried_homeowner.description: A person wringing their hands, looking anxiously at their house.

dialog.accept_guide: Excellent! Follow me, I'll show you the way. Type 'stop' at any time if you wish to cancel.
dialog.arrival_handoff: Here it is. Please, be careful in there. I'll wait out here for you.
dialog.greeting: Oh, hello there! I see you've taken my notice from the board. Thank goodness!
dialog.greeting_extended: My house is just over at the {entry_location_desc}. Please, get rid of those awful creatures! If you're not sure where that is, I can guide you there. Just say the word.

worried_homeowner.name: Worried Homeowner
